Reviews.Title: better than an iphone
Reviews.Author: Bob Sacamano
Reviews.Content: does exactly what it claims to.  a great compact android phone with an excellent camera- just make sure you have some type of data plan as my wifi would not work without one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!!
Reviews.Author: Erodes Berbetz
Reviews.Content: The product works perfectly. It arrived on time, no cons at all!Phone has a good fit and finish and good quality. Also good cost/benefit ratio.

Reviews.Title: Big mistake
Reviews.Author: giorgi
Reviews.Content: If you buy this mobile phone it will be big mistake..When I bought this I thought that it was small and cool phone but It is mistake..I can't use this phone because it always shut downs itself.I can't even call someone because it will turn off automatically..So don't buy this phone It's my advise.

Reviews.Title: must have phone
Reviews.Author: carla
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing, itz small and cute it worth buying, everyone who saw it loved it, i would recommend anyone to purchase this phone.
